data.text: @TheKenyanMemes Are in possession of information which is of significant public interest due to its relation to the protection of human rights, the environment, or public health and safety, or to exposure of corruption or illegal actions, or protection of any right. [2/2]

@TheKenyanMemes However, under the ATI Act we oversight private bodies  that receive public resources and benefits, utilise public funds, engage in public functions, provide provide public services, have exclusive contracts to exploit natural resources. [1/2]
@TheKenyanMemes Good morning, our mandate does not cover private entities under our constitutive act which mandates us to address the issue of maladministration.
